data.title: Dreamweaver - ADOBE? vs MACROMEDIA?
data.meta_description:
What are the main differences between Macromedia Dreamweaver and Adobe Dreamweaver?

are they both the same, but just on different names ? o
data.text:
What are the main differences between Macromedia Dreamweaver and Adobe Dreamweaver?

are they both the same, but just on different names ? or the layout., settings are differenet?

or they both do the same job basically, and one is an updated version of the other?

Is it a bit learning curve from Macromedia dreamweaver -> adobe dreamweaver?

Cheers
